md

Class SystemMD

  • java.lang.Object
    • md.SystemMD
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AtomList, ResidueList, SegmentList

    public class SystemMD
extends java.lang.Object
implements AtomList, ResidueList, SegmentList
    Stores the information of the whole system
    Since:
    Sindo 3.6
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Kiyoshi Yagi

      • removeSegmentList

        public void removeSegmentList(int index)
                       throws BuilderException
        Removes a segment from the list, and shifts any subsequent element to the left (subtracts one from their indices).

        Throws:
        BuilderException - thrown when the segment list is closed

      • generateTrajectory

        public Trajectory generateTrajectory()
        Generates and returns the trajectory of the system. The first frame of the trajectory is set from the atoms and box of the system. An empty one is returned if the atoms/box don't exist.
        Returns:
        The trajectory

      • setTrajectory

        public void setTrajectory(Trajectory traj)
        Sets the trajectory of the system
        Parameters:
        traj - The trajectory

        Parameters:
        n - the frame number
